name: Configure various tools to use custom CA cert
description: Enables several tools to use given custom CA Cert.

cert_path.description: Path to CA Cert (must be available within container). By default value from SSL_CERT_PATH will be used.

update_cert_stores_during_build.description: Whether to run the keytool / update-ca-certificates during build or in the onCreatedCommand (the latter allows for mounting the cert after the image is build).
